titleStmt.title: Remarks on the new philosophy of Des-Cartes in four parts ... / done by a gentleman.
titleStmt.author: Howard, Edward.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J. Gardyner and sold by Richard Ellison ...,

notesStmt.note: The author's epistle dedicatory signed: Ed. Howard.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
(from t.p.) I. Of the principles of humane knowledge -- II. Of the principles of material things -- III. Of the principles as they relate to the visible world -- IV. Of the principles of the earth.
